nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util

Class Sandbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util.Sandbox

  • public class Sandbox
extends Object
    Sandbox is a place where files/directories can be uploaded to or downloaded from. Example to submit a job with input and output files: 
     {
     @code
     Sandbox sandbox = new Sandbox(octopus, sandboxBase);
     sandbox.addUploadFile(inputfile);
     sandbox.addDownloadFile(outputfile);
 
     sandbox.upload();
 
     Job job = octopus.jobs().submitJob(description);
 
     JobStatus = octopus.jobs().waitUntilDone(job, 60000);
 
     sandbox.download();
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sandbox

        public Sandbox(Octopus octopus,
       AbsolutePath root,
       String sandboxName)
        throws OctopusException,
               OctopusIOException
        Creates a sandbox. Root and sandboxName will be concatenated to a path into which files can be uploaded/downloaded.
        Parameters:
        octopus - An Octopus instance
        root - Directory in which sandbox will be created.
        sandboxName - Name of the sandbox. If null a random name will be used.
        Throws:
        OctopusException
        OctopusIOException

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public AbsolutePath getPath()
        Returns:
        Path in which files will be uploaded and downloaded.

      • getUploadFiles

        public List<Sandbox.Pair> getUploadFiles()
        Returns:
        List of files that will be uploaded on execution of method.

      • setUploadFiles

        public void setUploadFiles(AbsolutePath... files)

      • addUploadFile

        public void addUploadFile(AbsolutePath src)
        Add a file to the list of files to upload.
        Parameters:
        src - Source path of file. Can not be null.

      • addUploadFile

        public void addUploadFile(AbsolutePath src,
                 String dest)
        Add a file to the list of files to upload.
        Parameters:
        src - Where file should be uploaded from. Can not be null.
        dest - Name of file in sandbox. When null the src.getFilename() will be used.

      • getDownloadFiles

        public List<Sandbox.Pair> getDownloadFiles()
        Returns:
        List of files that will be downloaded on execution of method.

      • addDownloadFile

        public void addDownloadFile(String src,
                   AbsolutePath dest)
        Add file to the list of files to download.
        Parameters:
        src - Name of file in sandbox. When null the dest.getFilename() will be used.
        dest - Where file should be downloaded to. Can not be null.
